content.text: "Deep Ocean Current" Umit is a shipping magnate and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

Umit is an older man with bags and age spots under his eyes. He has long black hair, a beard, and curled mustache, and he wears a large bicorne with anchor on the front and three feathers sticking out of the left side. He wears a brown coat over a ruffled white shirt, a yellow scarf, and wrinkled pants.

images.caption: Umit's concept art from the anime.

content.text: Umit appears quite serious and angry in contrast to the joy and amusement his fellow emperors show.
As an emperor of the Underworld, Umit possesses some amount of power within it. He is important enough to be invited to the Yonko Big Mom's tea parties.

Umit was invited to Big Mom's Tea Party, where Charlotte Pudding and Sanji would get married. He and several other emperors arrived on Whole Cake Island. Charlotte Perospero escorted the emperors to the banquet hall on a candy escalator, and the tea party began.
Umit and his fellow emperors presented Big Mom with their gifts. They were excited to see the Tamatebako nearby and hear that Big Mom would reveal its contents after the wedding ceremony.
After Luffy started causing chaos at the wedding venue, Umit was shocked to witness Brook (disguised as a Luffy duplicate) smashing the picture of Carmel.
When the Tamatebako dropped to the base of the Whole Cake Chateau, the bomb inside the chest exploded, causing the chateau to topple over. As the castle collapsed, Umit fell with it.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 86 Chapter 860 (p. 8-12, 15-17) and Episode 828, Umit makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 86 Chapter 860 (p. 9) and Episode 8.
